entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h.
